	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 0;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>
		</div>

<div class="cbody">
	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 1;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>
		</div>

	</div>

	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";

<style>
/**横向导航栏样式**/
.menu{height:36px;line-height:36px;border-top:2px solid #999999;padding-left:6px;}
.menu li ul {
list-style-type:none;
margin:0 auto;
margin-left:0px;
padding:0;
}
.menu ul li{padding:0px;}
.menu li {
float:left;
text-align:center;
position:relative;
padding:0;
z-index:1000;
}
.menu li a.twoW{ width:70px;}
.menu li a.threeW{ width:90px;}
.menu li a.fourW{ width:100px;}
.menu li a.fiveW{ width:110px;}

}

font-size:16px;color:#fff;font-family:'微软雅黑';padding:0;font-weight:bold; line-height:36px; text-decoration:none;background:#999; 
}

.menu li ul li a:hover {

}
.menu li.cur li a{ color:#333;}

			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 2;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>
		</div>

	</div>

<div class="cbody">
	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

/**横向导航栏样式**/

margin:0 auto;
margin-left:0px;
padding:0;
}

}

}

			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 3;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>
		</div>

<div class="cbody">
	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

/**横向导航栏样式**/

padding:0;
}

border-bottom:none;
}
a:hover{ text-decoration:none; color:#004181;}
.wbox_ul ul li a:hover{color:#004181;}
.imbox_ul ul li a:hover{color:#004181;}
.rebox_news ul li a:hover{color:#004181;}
.jgbox_news tr a:hover,.fubot ul li a:hover,.fubos ul li a:hover{color:#004181;}
.searchx .txt{BACKGROUND: url(https://www.fmprc.gov.cn/web/images/txt2015.gif) no-repeat;}
.searchx .sub{BACKGROUND: url(https://www.fmprc.gov.cn/web/images/sub2015.gif) no-repeat;}
.zhbox_search .txt{BACKGROUND: url(https://www.fmprc.gov.cn/web/images/txt2015.gif) no-repeat;}

			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 4;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>
		</div>

	</div>

	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

.search_left .txt{height:19px;line-height:19px;}
#News_Body_Title{margin:32px auto 0;width:872px;}
input{outline:none;}
</style>

			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 5;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>
		</div>

	</div>

	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 6;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>
		</div>

	</div>

	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 7;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>
		</div>

	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 8;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>

	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 9;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>

	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 10;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>

	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 11;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>

	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 12;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>
		</div>

	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 13;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>

	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 14;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>
		</div>

	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 15;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>
		</div>

	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 16;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>
		</div>

	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 17;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>
		</div>

	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 18;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>
		</div>

	</div>

	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 19;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>
		</div>

	</div>

	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 20;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>

	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 21;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>
		</div>

	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 22;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>
		</div>

	</div>

	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 23;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>
		</div>

	</div>

	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 24;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>
		</div>

	</div>

	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

				<li><a href="./t1687809.shtml" target="_blank">外交部发言人华春莹就英方涉港错误言行答记者问</a>(2019-08-10)</li>

			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 25;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>
		</div>

	</div>

	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

				<li><a href="./t1685719.shtml" target="_blank">2019年8月2日外交部发言人华春莹主持例行记者会</a>(2019-08-02)</li>
				
				<li><a href="./t1685306.shtml" target="_blank">2019年8月1日外交部发言人华春莹主持例行记者会</a>(2019-08-01)</li>
				
				<li><a href="./t1684951.shtml" target="_blank">2019年7月31日外交部发言人华春莹主持例行记者会</a>(2019-07-31)</li>
				
				<li><a href="./t1684475.shtml" target="_blank">2019年7月30日外交部发言人华春莹主持例行记者会</a>(2019-07-30)</li>
				
				</ul>

			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 26;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>
		</div>

	</div>

	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

				<li><a href="./t1680056.shtml" target="_blank">2019年7月10日外交部发言人耿爽主持例行记者会</a>(2019-07-10)</li>
				
				</ul>
			</div>
			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 27;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>
		</div>
		<div class="cl"></div>
	</div>

	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 28;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>
		</div>
		<div class="cl"></div>
	</div>
<div class="cl"></div>
</div>

	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 29;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>
		</div>
		<div class="cl"></div>
	</div>
<div class="cl"></div>
</div>

.copyright a{font-size:14px;color:#333;}
</style>

function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 30;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>
		</div>
		<div class="cl"></div>
	</div>
<div class="cl"></div>
</div>
<style>
.copyright a{font-size:14px;color:#333;}
</style>

function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 31;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>
		</div>
		<div class="cl"></div>
	</div>
<div class="cl"></div>
</div>

.copyright a{font-size:14px;color:#333;}
</style>
<div class="copyright">

	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>
