			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 32;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>
		</div>

	</div>

function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 33;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>
		</div>

	</div>

function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 34;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

<script>
var _taq = _taq || [];
_taq.home = '//ta.trs.cn/c';
_taq.push(['_mpId', '469']);
_taq.push(['_cli', '1']);
(function(d, o, t) {
	if (window.inTRSDesignMode) return;
	var ma = d.createElement(o); ma.async = true; ma.commonresource="1"; ma.src = t;
	var s = d.getElementsByTagName(o)[0]; s.parentNode.insertBefore(ma, s);
})(document, 'script', '//ta.trs.cn/c/js/ta.js');

document.getElementById("jiucuo_url").href="http://121.43.68.40/exposure/jiucuo.html?site_code=bm02000004&url="+window.location.href;
</script>

	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 35;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>
		</div>
		<div class="cl"></div>
	</div>
<div class="cl"></div>

	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 36;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";

			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 37;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>
		</div>

<div class="cbody">
	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>
<style>
/**横向导航栏样式**/
.menu{height:36px;line-height:36px;border-top:2px solid #999999;padding-left:6px;}
.menu li ul {
list-style-type:none;
margin:0 auto;
margin-left:0px;
padding:0;
}
.menu ul li{padding:0px;}
.menu li {
float:left;
text-align:center;
position:relative;
padding:0;
z-index:1000;
}
.menu li a.twoW{ width:70px;}
.menu li a.threeW{ width:90px;}
.menu li a.fourW{ width:100px;}
.menu li a.fiveW{ width:110px;}
.menu li a.sixW{ width:130px;}
.menu li a{
display:block; text-decoration:none; padding:0;font-size:16px;color:#000000;font-family:'微软雅黑';font-weight:bold; line-height:36px;
}
.menu li a:hover {
font-size:16px;color:#fff;font-family:'微软雅黑';padding:0;font-weight:bold; line-height:36px; text-decoration:none;background:#999; 
}
.menu li.cur{background:#999;}
.menu li.cur a{ color:#fff;}
.menu li ul li a{font-size:14px; color:#333; text-decoration:none; display:block; width:100px; text-align:left; font-weight:normal;  padding:8px 5px 8px 25px;  line-height:16px; white-space:normal; border-bottom:#999 1px solid;}
.menu li ul li a:hover {
font-size:14px; color:#333; padding:8px 5px 8px 25px;font-weight:normal; background-color:#fff; line-height:16px;
}
.menu li.cur li a{ color:#333;}
.menu li ul li{margin:0 auto; padding:0;}
.menu li ul {
margin:0 auto;
padding:0;
display:none;
position:absolute; 
top:36px;
left:0px;
width:130px;
background-color:#e6e6e6;
border:#999 1px solid;
border-bottom:none;
}

			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 38;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>
		</div>

	</div>

	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

/**横向导航栏样式**/

border:#999 1px solid;
border-bottom:none;
}
a:hover{ text-decoration:none; color:#004181;}
.wbox_ul ul li a:hover{color:#004181;}

.rebox_news ul li a:hover{color:#004181;}
.jgbox_news tr a:hover,.fubot ul li a:hover,.fubos ul li a:hover{color:#004181;}

.searchx .sub{BACKGROUND: url(https://www.fmprc.gov.cn/web/images/sub2015.gif) no-repeat;}

			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 39;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>
		</div>

	</div>

	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 40;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>

	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 41;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>
		</div>

	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 42;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>

	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 43;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 44;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>

	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 45;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>

	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 46;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>

	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 47;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>

	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 48;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>

	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 49;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>
		</div>

	</div>

	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 50;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>

	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 51;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>
		</div>

	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 52;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>
		</div>

	</div>

	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 53;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>
		</div>

	</div>

	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 54;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>

	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 55;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>
		</div>

	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 56;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>

	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 57;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>
		</div>

	</div>

	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 58;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>
		</div>

	</div>

	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 59;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>
		</div>
		<div class="cl"></div>
	</div>

	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

				<li><a href="./t1487092.shtml" target="_blank">2017年8月24日外交部发言人华春莹主持例行记者会</a>(2017-08-24)</li>
				
				</ul>
			</div>
			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 60;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>
		</div>
		<div class="cl"></div>
	</div>

	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 61;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>
		</div>
		<div class="cl"></div>
	</div>
<div class="cl"></div>
</div>

.copyright a{font-size:14px;color:#333;}

	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 62;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>
		</div>
		<div class="cl"></div>
	</div>
<div class="cl"></div>
</div>
<style>
.copyright a{font-size:14px;color:#333;}
</style>

	<script type="text/javascript">
function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 63;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>
		</div>
		<div class="cl"></div>
	</div>
<div class="cl"></div>
</div>
<style>
.copyright a{font-size:14px;color:#333;}
</style>

function displaySubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="cur";
   subMenu.style.display = "block";
}
function hideSubMenu(li) {
   var subMenu = li.getElementsByTagName("ul")[0];
   li.className="";
   subMenu.style.display = "none";
}
</script>

			<div class="page" id="pages" style="display:none;">
<script type="text/javascript">
var currentPage = 64;//所在页从0开始
var prevPage = currentPage-1//上一页
var nextPage = currentPage+1//下一页
var countPage = 67//共多少页
document.write("共"+countPage+"页&nbsp;&nbsp;");
//设置上一页代码
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage!=1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default"+"_" + prevPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=0&&currentPage==1)
	document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>首页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>上一页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("首页&nbsp;上一页&nbsp;");
//循环
var num = 5;
for(var i=0+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num) ; i<=(num+(currentPage-1-(currentPage-1)%num))&&(i<countPage) ; i++){
	if(currentPage==i)
		document.write("<span>"+(i+1)+"</span>&nbsp;");
	else if(i==0)
		document.write("<a href=\"default.shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
	else
		document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + i + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>"+(i+1)+"</a>&nbsp;");
}

//设置下一页代码 
if(countPage>1&&currentPage!=(countPage-1))
	document.write("<a href=\"default"+"_" + nextPage + "."+"shtml\" class='fy'>下一页</a>&nbsp;<a href=\"default_" + (countPage-1) + ".shtml\" class='fy'>尾页</a>&nbsp;");
else
	document.write("下一页&nbsp;尾页&nbsp;");
	
//跳转页面
document.write("<font class='9ptb'>转到第<input type='text' id='num' value="+(currentPage+1)+" style='width:30px;font-size:12px;'/>页"+
		             "&nbsp;<input class='sub' type='submit' value='跳转' onclick='javacript:toPage()'/></font>");
	             
function toPage(){
	var _num = document.getElementById("num").value;
	if(isNaN(_num)){
		alert("请输入数字");
		return false;
	}
	var str = "default"+"_"+(_num-1)+"."+"shtml";
	var url = location.href.substring(0,location.href.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
	if(_num<=1||_num==null)
		location.href = url+"default"+"."+"shtml";
	else if(_num>countPage)
		alert("本频道最多"+countPage+"页");
	else
		location.href = url+str;
}
</script>

		</div>
		</div>
		<div class="cl"></div>
	</div>
<div class="cl"></div>
</div>
